name: joint secretariat, Interreg B, Alpine Space programme
goal: The Interreg B, Alpine Space programme is a European transnational cooperation programme for the Alpine region. It provides a framework to facilitate the cooperation between economic, social and environmental key players in seven Alpine countries, as well as between various institutional levels such as: academia, administration, business and innovation sector, and policy making. The programme is financed through the European Regional Development Fund (ERDF) as well as through national public and private co-funding of the Partner States.
euInitiatives: Cohesion policy, European territorial cooperation (Interreg), regional development, EU policies
